original: 會稽餘姚人，孫吳官員，虞翻族子。生平未見於史冊，僅能從餘姚穴湖村出土《虞羨碑》窺探一二。曾任東吳牙門將，吳亡後，不再出仕。
text: Yuyao, Kuaiji, official Sun Wu, son of Yufan clan. His life has not been seen in the annals of history, only one or two can be glimpsed from the 'Yuxian Stele' unearthed from Yuyao Xuhu Village. Served as Soochow tooth goalkeeper, after Wu died, he no longer served in official positions.
